info.title: iaq_mon_plat_api
info.description: The API for IAQ Monitoring Platform

get.description: Returns information regarding sensors, rooms and sensor types

223.description: Rooms with sensors and their sensor types

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

get.description: Returns an array of future IAQ predictions

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: the ID of the room that you want info on

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The time where you want the prediction algorithm to run from, in string format "2020-04-20T12:00:00""

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

get.description: Returns warnings based on the prediction algorithm

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: the ID of the room that you want info on

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The time where you want the prediction algorithm to run from, in string format "2020-04-20T12:00:00""

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

get.description: Returns live data a room, split into intervals

parameters.name: roomID
parameters.description: the ID of the sensor that you want info on

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The time where you want the prediction algorithm to run from, in string format "2020-04-20T12:00:00""

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

get.description: Checks if admin credentials are ok

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

get.description: Returns all warnings and solutions from DB

222.description: Rooms with sensors and their sensor types

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

put.description: Adds a new warning to the DB

parameters.name: sensorType
parameters.description: The index of the sensor type

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message assosiated with the warning

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

delete.description: Removes a warning from the DB

parameters.name: warningID
parameters.description: The ID of the warning to be removed

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

patch.description: Updates a warning from the DB

parameters.name: warningID
parameters.description: The ID of the warning to be updated

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The updated message of the warning

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

put.description: Adds a new solution to the DB

parameters.name: warningID
parameters.description: The ID of the warning the new solution should be attached to

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: The priority of the solution, numbers from 1-3 where 1 is low, 2 is medium and 3 is high

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

patch.description: Detaches a solution from a warning

parameters.name: solutionID
parameters.description: The ID of the solution, whos attachment to a warning should be cut

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

patch.description: Updates a solutions message and/or priority

parameters.name: solutionID
parameters.description: The ID of the target solution

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The new message of the solution

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: New priority of the soluton, number from 1-3

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

patch.description: Attaches an existing solution to a warning

parameters.name: solutionID
parameters.description: The ID of the target solution

parameters.name: warningID
parameters.description: The new message of the solution

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

delete.description: Removes a solution from the DB

parameters.name: solutionID
parameters.description: The ID of the target solution

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

get.description: Gets all solutions in the DB

228.description: All the solutions in the DB

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

put.description: Adds a new room to the DB

parameters.name: roomName
parameters.description: The name of the new room

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

parameters.name: roomID
parameters.description: The index of the room to be removed

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

get.description: Gets all the sensor types in the DB

210.description: Array of all sensor types in the database

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

put.description: Adds a new sensor type to the DB

parameters.name: typeName
parameters.description: The name of the new sensor type

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

patch.description: Attaches an existing sensor type to a sensor

parameters.name: sensorType
parameters.description: The ID of the sensor type to attach

parameters.name: sensorID
parameters.description: The ID of the sensor to attach the type to

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: The initial threshold value of the sensor type

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

delete.description: Removed a sensor type from the DB

parameters.name: sensorType
parameters.description: The ID of the sensor type to remove

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

patch.description: Detach a sensor type from a sensor

parameters.name: sensorType
parameters.description: The ID of the sensor type

parameters.name: sensorID
parameters.description: The ID of the sensor type

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

patch.description: Update a sensors sensor type threshold

parameters.name: sensorType
parameters.description: The ID of the sensor type

parameters.name: sensorID
parameters.description: The ID of the sensor type

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: The new threshold for the sensor type

schema.example: An error occured on the server!

parameters.name: roomID
